item1:
码垛空托盘入立库暂存
Palletizing empty pallets into the AS/RS storage
item2:
空托盘可堆叠入立体库暂存，需要绑定承载托盘码(父托盘)以便入库扫码识别
Empty pallets can be stacked into the AS/RS storage. You need to bind the pallet code (parent pallet) to identify the code when entering the warehouse.
item4:
有未绑定货物的及未绑定父托盘的空托盘
Empty pallets with unbound article and unbound parent pallet
item5:
父托盘号及子托盘号
Parent pallet number and child pallet number
输出
item6:
空托盘绑定明细
Details of empty pallet binding
异常处里
item7:
如果输入指定的空托盘并非空托盘或已绑定父托盘，系统将提示错误信息，用户可执行Data Inquire-->Q090 Location Usage Status Query作业查询空托盘所在储位；
If the specified empty pallet is not an empty pallet or the parent pallet is bound, the system will prompt an error message, and the user can run the Data Inquire-> Q090 Location Usage Status Query job to query the storage location where the empty pallet is located;
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入父托盘号及子托盘号
Enter the parent and child tray numbers
2. 点选功能菜单Add加入清单
Click the function menu Add to add to the list
3. 点选功能菜单Execute可产生空托盘绑定明细
Click the function menu Execute to generate empty pallet binding details
4. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click the function menu Refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state.
5. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu Exit or close the window to end this operation
后置条件
item9:
人员可将完成绑定父托盘的空托盘置入立库入库输送机
Operator can place empty pallets that have been bound to the parent pallet into the inbound storage conveyor
备注
item10:
已绑定父托盘的空托盘，如果没有入库，可仍可作为收货使用，但随即解绑整叠与父托盘绑定的关系。从立库出库的空托盘亦随即解绑整叠与父托盘绑定的关系
The empty pallet that has been bound to the parent pallet can still be used as a receipt if it is not stored in the warehouse, but then the binding relationship between the entire stack and the parent pallet is unbound. The empty pallet from the AS/TS are unbound and the binding relationship between the stack and the parent pallet is immediately unbound.
